review: The stick works well streaming content clearly and quickly.  I like that it provides convenient access to Amazon prime video.  However, the stick seems to interfere with over the air tv signals.  I noticed after installing the fire tv stick that the OTA signal became garbled, and cleared up when unplugged.  It seems like it's not properly shielded.

review: The Fire Stick is a very good device considering it's size. The dual core chip does the job with Streaming and picture quality is excellent with HD resolution. I have both the Fire TV Box and Stick......The only drawback to the the Stick vs Fire TV is the lack of USB input for a keyboard to navigate.I would recommend it over the Chromecast in head to head usage because it comes with it's own remote and built in Apps. Chromecast depends on another device (Applle/Android/PC) to control it.Good luck
